azurerm_firewall_network_rule_collection.description: Manages a Network Rule Collection within an Azure Firewall.

name.description: Specifies the name of the rule.

azure_firewall_name.description: Specifies the name of the Firewall in which the Network Rule Collection should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the Resource Group in which the Firewall exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

priority.description: Specifies the priority of the rule collection. Possible values are between `100` - `65000`.

action.description: Specifies the action the rule will apply to matching traffic. Possible values are `Allow` and `Deny`.

rule.description: One or more `rule` blocks as defined below.

description.description: Specifies a description for the rule.

source_addresses.description: A list of source IP addresses and/or IP ranges.

destination_addresses.description: A list of destination IP addresses and/or IP ranges.

protocols.description: A list of protocols. Possible values are `Any`, `ICMP`, `TCP` and `UDP`.
